modShortDescription: Makes "Can of Pasta" able to be reasonably crafted, and also allows "Spaghetti" to be crafted from using "Raw Meat".
modDescription:
Makes “Can of Pasta” able to be reasonably crafted, and also allows “Spaghetti” to be crafted from using “Raw Meat”. This will allow you to gain access to the [food](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/) without relying on RNG drops in the world and use current ingredients that fall behind in later game.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1yE8n7tdaL1Y2rhYclDytyhJ58rV_EcxJ?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** Gordrax
